column4: hi! i tried to install 7.10 erlier today... and when i start the live cd my computer just crashes... like you pulled the power cord... do i have to start the live-cd to install ubuntu? (downloading 8.10 as we speak)

hi! i tried to install 7.10 erlier today... and when i start the live cd my computer just crashes... like you pulled the power cord... do i have to start the live-cd to install ubuntu? (downloading 8.10 as we speak)
no you dont. there is also an "install" option on the live cd. or you can use the alternate cd for a text mode installer
and sFEARs : thanks ^^ i'll look into that when i have 8.10... but it doesnt matter what distro it is... tried the openSUSE live-cd as well xD something's strange with my ram i guess
there is a ram checker on the cd :-)
i know that too :P just took to long last time... gonna test it tomorrow when i'm away :P
